meanings.definition: A number of things or events arranged in order and connected by being alike in some way.
meanings.sent1: I watched a series of movies over the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a series of colorful notebooks.
meanings.sent3: The series of matching socks seemed to disappear one by one.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rang out in a series of joyful bursts.
meanings.sent5: The series of puzzles challenged my problem-solving skills.

meanings.definition: A set of television or radio broadcasts on the same subject or using the same characters but in different situations.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching a series about detectives solving mysteries.
meanings.sent2: The new series on TV features a group of friends living in the city.
meanings.sent3: The series of cooking shows made me hungry for new recipes.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of dramatic episodes.
meanings.sent5: The series of podcasts entertained me during my commute.

meanings.definition: A set of books, maps, etc., that are published in a particular order.
meanings.sent1: I borrowed a series of fantasy novels from the library.
meanings.sent2: The encyclopedia set is a series of informative books.
meanings.sent3: The series of maps guided us through the winding forest trails.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of poetry books formed a series of emotional journeys.
meanings.sent5: The series of history textbooks covered different time periods.
